en.title: FE Sets Up FusionExcel Long Drive Challenge.
en.content:
FE is proud to announce FE’s very own Fusion Excel Long Drive Challenge (FELDC) working together with International Long Drive Specialist, Jean Daniels and Margaret Yip, CEO of World Corporate Golf Challenge Malaysia. FELDC will be promoted regionally in countries where FE’s members are active, including but not limited to Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, Hong Kong, etc. FELDC will feature International Long Drive Champions from around the world, including from the USA. FELDC will be open to the public and will provide an excellent opportunity for FE’s members to further build their network. Details of FELDC will be published soon.

Once again, FE shows innovation and leads the way in the MLM industry!
